a_active_users.label: Number of Active Users
a_active_users.description:
The maximum number of engineers who have used GitHub Copilot in the last 90 days
Source: GitHub

a_ai_adoption_rate.label: AI Adoption Rate
a_ai_adoption_rate.description:
The percentage of code lines accepted compared to lines suggested
Source: GitHub

a_ai_usage.label: AI Usage
a_ai_usage.description:
The number of times engineers used Copilot Chat
Source: GitHub

a_code_suggestions.label: Code Lines Suggested
a_code_suggestions.description:
Total number of code lines suggested
Source: GitHub

a_code_accepted.label: Code Lines Accepted
a_code_accepted.description:
Total number of code lines accepted
Source: GitHub

s_pr_review_time.label: Avg PR Review Time (Mins)
s_pr_review_time.description:
Average time from pull request creation to the first approval of merged pull requests
Source: BitBucket

q_code_smells.label: Code Quality / Code Smells
q_code_smells.description:
The total number of quality issues identified by SonarQube
Source: SonarQube

q_coverage.label: Unit Test Coverage
q_coverage.description:
The percentage of code that is tested by unit tests
Source: SonarQube

q_bugs.label: Bugs
q_bugs.description:
The total number of bugs identified by SonarQube
Source: SonarQube

q_vulnerabilities.label: Vulnerabilities
q_vulnerabilities.description:
The total number of vulnerabilities identified by SonarQube
Source: SonarQube

e_user_satisfaction.label: User Satisfaction
e_user_satisfaction.description:
The percentage of users that are Satisfied or Very Satisfied
Source: Survey

e_adoption.label: Adoption & Frequency
e_adoption.description:
The percentage of users who use GitHub Copilot frequently
Source: Survey

e_productivity.label: Productivity, Quality & Benefits Sentiments
e_productivity.description:
The percentage of users who strongly agree that they are more confident in in their quality of work, that they complete tasks faster, learn from suggestions and/or save brainpower in repetitive tasks
Source: Survey

d_deployment_frequency.label: Deployment Frequency
d_deployment_frequency.description:
Number of times code is deployed to production
Source: Jenkins
